prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
NISCHITHA M
Email: nischithanishu18@gmail.com
Phone: +91 8095977219
Professional Summary
● Experienced IT professional with top-notch implementation and project
management abilities. Highly organized, methodical and skilled at building
consensus across high-performance teams.
● Continual improvement: always growing ones craft, learning new
tools and techniques to manage oneself and a team
● Strong background in backend development (C#, .NET Core) and frontend
development (Angular).
● Experienced in mentoring and leading teams, particularly in India-based locations.
● Hands-on experience in web application development, API development, and
cloud deployment.
● Skilled in AWS cloud services, CI/CD pipelines, and serverless architecture.
● Expertise in upgrading Angular applications to the latest versions.
● Adept at supporting R&D projects and providing production support.
Technical Skills
● Programming: .NET MVC, .NET Core, C#, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS
● Cloud Services: AWS (EC2, S3, IAM, CloudWatch, Route53, Load Balancing, Auto
Scaling)
● DevOps & CI/CD: Jenkins, Git, Serverless Architecture
● Database: MS SQL Server, MongoDB
● Version Control: Git, TFS
● Other Technologies: REST API, Microservices, Web API
Work Experience
Technical Specialist- Continental Automotive PVT LTD (Jun 2022 - Dec 2024)
System Management Tool (SMT)
● Technologies: .NET Core (Backend), Angular (Frontend), AWS (Cloud Deployment)
● Mentored team members in India, providing guidance and technical leadership.
● Experienced in agile practices including scrum calls, sprint planning, daily stand-
ups, backlog refinement, sprint retrospectives, and other related processes.
● Angular applications to the latest version, ensuring enhanced performance, security,
and compatibility with modern frameworks and best practices.● Provided support for R&D by designing, implementing, and managing CI/CD
pipelines for cloud deployment in a serverless architecture. Hosted the Angular
application
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
